request.title: wirelesslan Parcel Schema
request.description: wirelesslan profile parcel schema for POST request

password.description: Set management password,the password must contains characters from all of the following classes,lowercase letters,uppercase letters,digits,and special characters. No character in the password can be repeated more than three times consecutively. The password must not be the same as the associated username or the username reversed. The password must not be cisco,ocsic,or any variant obtained by changing the capitalization of the letters in word cisco. In addition,you can't substitute 1,l,or ! for i,0 for o,$ for s.

meIpConfig.description: ME management IP configuration, if ME IP address is assigned by DHCP, a DHCP server parcel, a Wlan-GigabitEthernet switchport parcel, and a management SVI interface parcel must be created and associate with configuration group.

meDynamicIpEnabled.description: ME management IP dynamic allocated by DHCP
Mobility Express management IP dynamic assigned static

meStaticIpCfg.description: Mobility Express management IP static configuration

netmask.description: Set mobile express controller subnet mask

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for wirelesslan profile parcel
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
